segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems quite determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry seeing him climb up there so unsafely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why he doesn't just ask for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing next to him seems to be encouraging his behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted by their sneaky actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should know better than to climb on furniture like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees them before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're being quite irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what they would do if they got caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Would they try to deny what they were doing, or would they just run away?
segments.speaker: PAR
